title: Classical/Quantum Duality
abstract: String theory requires two kinds of loop expansion: classical $(\alpha')$ worldsheet loops with expansion parameter $$ where $T$ is a modulus field, and quantum $(\hbar)$ spacetime loops with expansion parameter $$ where $S$ is the dilaton field. Four-dimensional string/string duality (a corollary of ten-dimensional string/fivebrane duality) interchanges the roles of $S$ and $T$ and hence interchanges classical and quantum.
